results.title: Citron leads Washington against Dallas after 21-point game
Minnesota hosts Connecticut following overtime win
Predicting Ace Bailey’s Rookie Stats, Role With Jazz
results.description: There are probably more people talking about Utah Jazz forward Ace Bailey than Dallas Mavericks forward Cooper Flagg right now. After drafting the southern shot-maker with the fifth overall pick in the 2025 NBA Draft, there were questions abound about what would follow.
